location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Key Map to Boundaries of Military Report Areas in Mesopotamia'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in Colour on PaperDimensions: 290 x 285mm

mods.abstract: This map shows the overall designation of various military region across Iraq from 1923. It also shows the major hydrological features of Mesopotamia, namely the Tigris and Euphrates rivers in relation to the boundaries of Iraq's ten military areas.
